description: Describes a stack's Elastic Load Balancing instances. Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Show, Deploy, or Manage permissions level for the stack, or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information about user permissions, see Managing User Permissions.

parameters.name: LayerIds
parameters.description: A list of layer IDs. The action describes the Elastic Load Balancing instances for the specified layers. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ElasticLoadBalancers
nested_items.description: A list of ElasticLoadBalancer objects that describe the specified Elastic Load Balancing instances.

nested_items.name: ElasticLoadBalancerName
nested_items.description: The Elastic Load Balancing instance name.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The instance's Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The ID of the stack with which the instance is associated.

nested_items.name: LayerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the layer to which the instance is attached.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: A list of subnet IDs, if the stack is running in a VPC.

nested_items.name: Ec2InstanceIds
nested_items.description: A list of the EC2 instances for which the Elastic Load Balancing instance is managing traffic.
